artist: Artist: Arnaldo Pomodoro; Author: Guido Ballo; Printer: Giorgio Upiglio , Milan; Publisher: Galleria Schwarz, Milan
creditline: Gift of Gordon Locksley and George Shea
description: Plate published as part of an illustrated book in portfolio with text and 6 etchings (3 with aquatint); 3 soft-ground etchings (1 with embossing and 1 with collagraph); and 1 collagraph
title: Plate from L'Albero Poeta
